info.title: TripCheck API v1
info.description: TripCheck API is designed to provide developers with access to the data available on ODOT’s traveler information website, including incidents, cameras, message signs, weather stations, and more. For more information, go to https://www.tripcheck.com/.

get.description:
The CCTV Inventory datafeed provides an inventory of all available cameras 
currently displayed on TripCheck, along with an Internet URL that can be used 
to access the specific still camera image. Cameras may be ODOT owned and 
maintained or owned and maintained by a partner agency.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description:
Accepts single device-id, or multiple comma
            delimited device-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "157-160,281"

parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description:
Accepts single device-name, or multiple comma
            delimited device names. Performs a contains search.
            Ex.  "I-5 at Siskiyou Summit, Tollgate, I-84 at Clover Creek EB"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes.

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat 
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description:
Speed data aggregated by speed classification for each detector station. 
The Bin Count represents the speed of vehicles that passed the detector 
station in a 20 second period that fall into that particular speed classification.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station-id,
            or multiple comma delimited station-ids.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "7, 9-20"

parameters.name: Lane
parameters.description:
Accepts single lane, or multiple comma delimited lanes.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "1, 3-5"

parameters.name: RecordedDate
parameters.description:
Accepts date and time recorded-date,
            or multiple comma delimited recorded-dates. Performs a contains search.
            Ex.  "2016-10-12T12:36:03.8634263-07:00, 2017"

get.description:
Length data aggregated by length classification for each detector station. 
The Bin Count represents the number of vehicles that passed the detector 
station in a 20 second period that fall into that particular length classification.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station-id,
            or multiple comma delimited station-ids.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "7, 9-20"

parameters.name: Lane
parameters.description:
Accepts single lane, or multiple comma delimited lanes.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "1, 3-5"

parameters.name: RecordedDate
parameters.description:
Accepts date and time recorded-date,
            or multiple comma delimited recorded-dates. Performs a contains search.
            Ex.  "2016-10-12T12:36:03.8634263-07:00, 2017"

get.description:
Vehicle Length and Speed classifications for each Detector Station. 
This data defines what vehicle length values are being used for aggregation.
The data is collected through web services on Automated Traffic Controllers (ATCs).

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station-id,
            or multiple comma delimited station-ids.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "7, 9-20"

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Accepts single type, or multiple comma delimited types.
            Ex. "Length,Speed"

parameters.name: BinValueDesc
parameters.description:
Accepts single bin-value-description,
            or multiple comma delimited bin-value-descriptions.
            Performs a contains search. Ex. "1,20,40,60"

get.description: Name and Location of each Dynamic Message Sign on state highways or controlled by ODOT.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description:
Accepts single device-id, or multiple comma delimited
            device-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "209,223-229"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.description: Accepts sign class, or multiple comma delimited sign classes. Ex. "VMS_VSS, VMS_Drum"

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is 
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Statewide Dynamic Message Sign (DMS) returns current message data for active signs in the State of Oregon.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description:
Accepts single device-id, or multiple comma delimited
            device-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "209,223-229"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.description: Accepts sign class, or multiple comma delimited sign classes. Ex. "VMS_VSS, VMS_Drum"

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Current traffic incidents that are being reported on State Highways by ODOT – e.g. crashes, planned closures, and construction zones.

parameters.name: IncidentId
parameters.description: Accepts single incident-id, or multiple comma delimited incident-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "224412, 100000-100010"

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: Accepts single event-id, or multiple comma delimited event-ids. Ex. "20T001190,20T001182,20T001185"

parameters.name: EventTypeId
parameters.description:
Accepts single event type identifiers, or multiple comma delimited type ids. 
            Enumerations held within the Metadata: Incidents datafeed. Ex. "VH,RW,WT"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR" 
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state routes.

parameters.name: IsActive
parameters.description: Accepts a Boolean response. Ex. “True” returns all active incidents, while “False” returns all inactive incidents.

parameters.name: ImpactId
parameters.description: Accepts single impact-id, or multiple comma delimited impact-ids. Ex. "2,4,6"

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is 
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Returns an inventory of the Incident event types and event subtypes.
Parking lot occupancy and Gate closure data for the Multnomah Falls parking lot at Exit 31 of I-84.

404.description: Mulnomah Falls parking data not available

get.description: Returns a list of route names currently in the system.
Current road conditions as reported by ODOT crews. This includes weather observations and tire chain restrictions.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description: Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "20, 100-103"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited route-ids. Performs a contains search. 
            Ex. "I5,US97,OR" returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state routes.

parameters.name: RestrictionId
parameters.description: The driving RestrictionId accepts single restriction-id, or multiple comma delimited restriction-ids. Ex. “B,B1,D”

parameters.name: RoadCondId
parameters.description: The road-cond-id accepts single road-cond-id, or multiple comma delimited road-cond-id. Ranges optional. Ex. “1,2-6”

parameters.name: WeatherId
parameters.description: The WeatherId accepts single weather-id, or multiple comma delimited weather-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. “1,9,92-95”

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description: Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat Ex. "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is the bounds of Portland, OR

404.description: Road and Weather Reports not available

get.description: Returns an inventory of the enumerated values that are held within the TripCheck API Road and Weather datafeed.
Name and location of all the Weather Stations along state highways and what each station can measure.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited
            station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "24008, 24001-24004"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes. Depends on ~\AppData\RoutesMetadata.xml

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description:
Weather data from automated Weather stations along state highways 
(e.g. Air Temperature, Surface Temperature, wind speed, etc.) 
Note: not all stations can measure all types of weather factors.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited
            station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "24008, 24001-24004"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes.

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Name and location of traffic detector stations and highway ramps associated with them.

parameters.name: JurisdictionId
parameters.description: Accepts single jurisdiction-ids, or multiple comma delimited jurisdiction-ids. Ex. “1,2”

parameters.name: LocationId
parameters.description: Accepts a single location-id of the station, or multiple comma delimited location-ids for multiple stations. Ex. “47,48,49”

parameters.name: HighwayName
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station location highway-name, or multiple comma delimited station location highway-names. 
            Performs a contains search. Ex. " I-205, OR-217, US " returns every item on route I-205, OR-217, US state routes.

parameters.name: Milepoint
parameters.description:
Accepts single station location milepoints. Most useful when also inputting a highway-name parameter. Ranges optional. 
            Ex. “100-300” Ex. “6.77”

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description: Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "20, 100-103"

parameters.name: StationClass
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-classes, or multiple comma delimited station-classes. Performs a contains search. 
            Ex. "MAINLINE, HOV" returns every item with class ‘MAINLINE’ and ‘HOV’

parameters.name: RampId
parameters.description: Accepts single ramp-ids, or multiple comma delimited ramp-ids. Ex. “10066, 10067”

get.description: Roadway traffic detectors collecting volume, occupancy and speed data from select roadways located in Oregon

parameters.name: JurisdictionId
parameters.description: Accepts single jurisdiction-ids, or multiple comma delimited jurisdiction-ids. Ex. “1,2”

parameters.name: LocationId
parameters.description: Accepts a single location-id of the station, or multiple comma delimited location-ids for multiple stations. Ex. “47,48,49”

parameters.name: HighwayName
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station location highway-name, or multiple comma delimited station location highway-names. 
            Performs a contains search. Ex. " I-205, OR-217, US " returns every item on route I-205, OR-217, US state routes.

parameters.name: Milepoint
parameters.description:
Accepts single station location milepoints. Most useful when also inputting a highway-name parameter. Ranges optional. 
            Ex. “100-300” Ex. “6.77”

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description: Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "20, 100-103"

parameters.name: StationClass
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-classes, or multiple comma delimited station-classes. Performs a contains search. 
            Ex. "MAINLINE, HOV" returns every item with class ‘MAINLINE’ and ‘HOV’

parameters.name: RampId
parameters.description: Accepts single ramp-ids, or multiple comma delimited ramp-ids. Ex. “10066, 10067”

get.description: Highway ramp data such as ramp occupancy, volume, and metering rate collected by ODOT Central Ramp Metering System for select ramps located in Oregon

parameters.name: JurisdictionId
parameters.description: Accepts single jurisdiction-ids, or multiple comma delimited jurisdiction-ids. Ex. “1,2”

parameters.name: LocationId
parameters.description: Accepts a single location-id of the station, or multiple comma delimited location-ids for multiple stations. Ex. “47,48,49”

parameters.name: HighwayName
parameters.description:
Accepts a single station location highway-name, or multiple comma delimited station location highway-names. 
            Performs a contains search. Ex. " I-205, OR-217, US " returns every item on route I-205, OR-217, US state routes.

parameters.name: Milepoint
parameters.description:
Accepts single station location milepoints. Most useful when also inputting a highway-name parameter. Ranges optional. 
            Ex. “100-300” Ex. “6.77”

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description: Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited station-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "20, 100-103"

parameters.name: StationClass
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-classes, or multiple comma delimited station-classes. Performs a contains search. 
            Ex. "MAINLINE, HOV" returns every item with class ‘MAINLINE’ and ‘HOV’

parameters.name: RampId
parameters.description: Accepts single ramp-ids, or multiple comma delimited ramp-ids. Ex. “10066, 10067”

get.description: Events occurring on local and county roads as reported by non-ODOT government agencies (ex., Washington County, City of Eugene Public Works).

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
Accepts single event Id, or multiple comma delimited Ids.
            Ranges optional. Ex. "209,223-229"

parameters.name: TypeId
parameters.description: Accepts single event type identifiers, or multiple comma delimited type ids. Enumerations held within the Metadata: All Incident feed. Ex. "1,2,3"

parameters.name: ImpactId
parameters.description: Accepts single impact identifiers, or multiple comma delimited impact ids. Enumerations held within the Metadata: All Incident feed. Ex. "1,2,3"

parameters.name: SourceAgency
parameters.description: The local agency responsible for the local incident

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Work zone related activities occurring throughout the State of Oregon formatted according to the WZDx standard created by the FHWA and USDOT.

parameters.name: subidentifier
parameters.description:
Accepts a single subidentifier, or multiple comma delimited subidentifier. 
            Ranges optional. Ex. " 100000, 100005-100010"

parameters.name: roadName
parameters.description:
Accepts single a roadName, or multiple comma delimited roadNames. Performs a contains search. 
            Ex. "I5,US97,OR" returns every item on the state roads I5, US97, and OR.

parameters.name: wz_status
parameters.description: The wz_status fields accepts single wz_status types. Ex. “Active”

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat 
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Returns an inventory of the enumerated values that are held within the TripCheck API Incidents and TLE Incidents datafeeds.

Current traffic incidents that are being reported on state highways by ODOT and formatted to the Waze CIFS V2 standard
– e.g. crashes, planned closures, and construction zones.

parameters.name: IncidentId
parameters.description: Accepts single incident-id, or multiple comma delimited incident-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "224412, 100000-100010"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR" 
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state 
            routes.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Accepts a single incident type,or multiple comma-delimited types. Ex. "ACCIDENT,ROAD_CLOSED,CONSTRUCTION,HAZARD"

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is 
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description: Name and location of all the Weather Stations along state highways and what each station can measure.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited
            station-ids which for v2 are MM Item Codes. Ranges NOT supported in v2. Ex. "2RW001, 2RW013"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes. Depends on ~\AppData\RoutesMetadata.xml

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description:
Weather data from automated Weather stations along state highways 
(e.g. Air Temperature, Surface Temperature, wind speed, etc.) 
Note: not all stations can measure all types of weather factors.
Note: uses RwisStatusNtcip.xml instead of RwisStatus2.xml to produce NTCIP standard values.

parameters.name: StationId
parameters.description:
Accepts single station-id, or multiple comma delimited
            station-ids which for v2 are MM Item Codes. Ranges NOT supported for V2. Ex. "2RW001, 2RW013"

parameters.name: RouteId
parameters.description:
Accepts single route-id, or multiple comma delimited
            route-ids. Performs a contains search. Ex. "I5,US97,OR"
            returns every item on route I5, US97, and OR state
            routes.

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is
            the bounds of Portland, OR

get.description:
Events occurring on local and county roads as reported by non-ODOT government agencies 
and formatted to the Waze CIFS V2 standard… (ex., Washington County, City of Eugene Public Works)

parameters.name: IncidentId
parameters.description: Accepts single incident-id, ormultiple comma-delimited incident-ids. Ranges optional. Ex. "224,100-110"

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Accepts a single incident type,or multiple comma-delimited types. Ex. "ACCIDENT,ROAD_CLOSED,CONSTRUCTION,HAZARD"

parameters.name: Bounds
parameters.description:
Lon/Lat rectangle bounds to filter:
            minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat
            Ex., "-122.875228,45.414915,-122.631469,45.559331" is 
            the bounds of Portland, OR

ClsData.description: CLS Bin Data (Length and Speed) output class

ClsDataItem.description: Class to hold a single station-bin reading

lane.description: The lane number this reading is from

bin-number.description: The identifier of the bin classification

bin-count.description: Number of vehicles matching the classification during the collection cycle

recorded-date.description: The date and time this data was recorded

ClsInventoryItem.description: Class to hold a single bin configuration for a CLS station

type.description: Classification of data collected by the station

bin-number.description: The identifier of the bin classification

configure-time.description: The time at which the classfication was configured

travel-lanes.description: Travel Lanes Info for the incident

direction.description: Direction of the incident or event

start-location.description: Begin Location of the incident or event

end-location.description: End Location of the incident or event

start-point-geometry-wkt.description: Start Point Geometry Well Known Text

end-point-geometry-wkt.description: End Point Geometry Well Known Text

lane-id.description: Descriptor of which lane is affected

incidents.description:
Incident information
Waze accepts feed data for both real-time or planned traffic incidents, 
including hazards on the road, construction, and more.Incidents don’t 
affect real-time navigation, they only alert drivers.
<a href="https://developers.google.com/waze/data-feed/incident-information" />

timestamp.description: Specifies the creation time of the feed.

incidentsIncident.description: Encapsulates all of the information pertaining to a single incident.

parent_event.description: For events with multiple closures such as marathons or festivals, you can associate the incident to an event object.

id.description:
Specifies an alphanumeric or numeric identifier.
The ID must be globally unique to your feed and remain stable over an incident’s lifetime.

creationtime.description: Datetime when the incident was created.

updatetime.description: Datetime when the incident was last updated.

source.description: Encapsulates the elements that specify the source of information for a single incident.

subtype.description: Further refinement of the information in the "type" element.

description.description: Describes the incident, including the possible cause and consequences of the disruption.

location.description: Encapsulates the location information for the incident.

starttime.description: Specifies the start datetime for the period of disruption.

endtime.description: Specifies the end datetime for the period of disruption.

schedule.description: The schedule encapsulates all start and end times for an recurring incident.

incidentsIncidentParent_event.description: For events with multiple closures such as marathons or festivals, you can associate the incident to an event object.

id.description: Specifies an alphanumeric or numeric identifier. The ID must be globally unique to your feed and remain stable over an incident’s lifetime.

incidentsIncidentSource.description: Encapsulates the elements that specify the source of information for a single incident.

reference.description: Uses a reference ID to identify the organization that sourced the information.

name.description: Identifies the organization from which the information was sourced, by the organization’s name.

url.description: Specifies the URL for the organization from which the information was sourced.

incidentsIncidentLocation.description: Encapsulates the location information for the incident.

location_description.description: Specifies the address or other textual description of the incident’s location.

street.description: Specifies the name of the street on which the incident is occurring.

polyline.description:
Specifies the WGS84 latitude/longitude coordinates that describe the location of the incident.
The decimal value should have at least 6 digits (to ensure accuracy of 0.11m or better).
For any incident, you must submit at least two coordinates.

direction.description: Specifies whether the disruption or closure affects one or both sides of the road.

incidentsIncidentSchedule.description: The schedule encapsulates all start and end times for an recurring incident.

IncidentMetadataItems.description: Class to hold the arrays of different incident metadata items.

IncdEventType.description: Class to hold details about an individual event type

IncdEventSubtype.description: Class to hold details about an individual event subtype

MFParking.description: Multnomah Falls Parking Data output class

ParkingLots.description: Parking Lot Information and Data class

parkingLotCalculation.description: Lot location and percentage full data

parkingLotDataArray.description: Array of collections of parking lot data

MfpCalculation.description: Parking lot location and percentage information

last-update-time.description: Last update time of the percentage data

location.description: Holds the location data for the parking lot

percentFull.description: Percentage full for the parking lot

percentFullMessage.description: String representation of parking lot percentage full

MfpLotData.description: Collection of parking lot information and data

LOT_SUM_ID.description: Identifier for this lot sum object

MfpLocation.description: Location data for the parking lot

locationName.description: The location name of the parking lot.

latitude.description: The latitude value of the coordinates of the parking lot's location.

longitude.description: The longitude value of the coordinates of the parking lot's location.

entry-time.description: The station segment report entry time

expiry-time.description: The station segment report expiration time

air-temperature.description: Temperature of the air in Celsius at the time the report was reported.

snowfall-accum-rate.description: Amount of new roadside snow in centimeters since the last scheduled reporting time

adjacent-snow-depth.description: Total depth of roadside snow in centimeters

RWItems.description: Class to hold the arrays of different road weather metadata items

weather-condition-list.description: List of all weather condition identifiers and descriptions

road-condition-list.description: List of all road condition identifiers and descriptions

commercial-vehicle-restriction-list.description: List of all commercial vehicle restriction identifiers, types, and descriptions

driving-restriction-list.description: List of all driving restriction identifiers and descriptions

WeatherCondition.description: List of all weather condition identifiers and descriptions

RoadCondition.description: List of all road condition identifiers and descriptions

CVRestriction.description: List of all commercial vehicle restriction identifiers, types, and descriptions

Restriction.description: List of all driving restriction identifiers and descriptions

RwisStatus.description: RWIS Status Weather Station Site List

WeatherStations.description: List of RWIS Status Weather Stations

RwisStatusSiteRoadWeather.description: RWIS Status Site Road and Weather Info

RwisStatusSiteSurfaceCondition.description: RWIS Status Site Surface Conditions Info

WeatherStations.description: List of RWIS Status Weather Stations

RwisStatusSiteWeatherStationV2.description: RWIS Status Site Weather Station V2

RwisStatusSiteRoadWeatherV2.description: RWIS Status Site Road Weather V2

air-temperature.description: Air temperature: essAirTemperature, tenth degree C (-1000..1000), error: 1001

atmospheric-pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure: essAtmosphericPressure, tenths of millibar, error: 65535

avg-wind-direction.description: Average wind direction: essAvgWindDirection, degrees (0-360), error: 361

avg-wind-gust-direction.description: Average wind gust direction: essMaxWindGustDir, degrees (0-360), error: 361

avg-wind-gust-speed.description: Average wind gust speed: essMaxWindGustSpeed, tenths meter per sec, error: 65535

avg-wind-speed.description: Average wind speed: essAvgWindSpeed, tenths meter per sec, error: 65535

dewpoint-temp.description: Dewpoint temperature: essDewpointTemp, tenth degree C (-1000..1000), error: 1001

precip-rate.description: Precipitation rate: essPrecipRate, tenths of grams per square meter per second, error: 65535

surface-freeze-point.description: Surface freeze point: essSurfaceFreezePoint, tenth degree C (-1000..1000), error: 1001

surface-salinity.description: Surface salinity: essSurfaceSalinity, parts per 100,000, error: 65535

water-depth.description: Water depth: essSurfaceIceOrWaterDepth, tenth millimeters (0..65535), error: 65535

surface-temperature.description: Surface temperature: essSurfaceTemperature, tenth degree C (-1000..1000), error: 1001

ramp-meter-status-items.description: List of Ramp Meter Status Items

StartLat.description: Head latitude for point and line events

StartLong.description: Head longitude for point and line events

GeometryWkt.description: Geometry well-known text for line and area events

TleIncidentItems.description: Class to hold the arrays of different TLE incident metadata items

TLE-incd-type-list.description: List of possible TLE incident types

TLE-travel-impact-list.description: List of possible TLE impact categories

WazeIncidentItems.description: Class to hold the arrays of different TLE incident metadata items

Waze-incd-type-list.description: List of possible Waze incident types

TleIncidentType.description: Class to hold details about an individual TLE incident type

TleTravelImpact.description: Class to hold details about an individual TLE severity category

WazeIncidentType.description: Class to hold details about an individual Waze incident type

WZDxHeader.description: This class contains all the WorkZone Activity fields

Identifier.description: A unique identifier of the work zone activity

SubIdentifier.description: The subidentifier is the identifier of the entirety of the work zone project

StartDateTime.description: The time and date when a work zone starts

EndDateTime.description: The time and date when a work zone ends

BeginLocation.description: The location when a workzone impact begins along a single road in a single direction

EndLocation.description: The location when a workzone impact ends along a single road in a single direction

Description.description: Short description of the work zone

StartDateTimeEst.description: The estimated time and date when a work zone starts

EndDateTimeEst.description: The estimated time and date when a work zone ends

RoadName.description: The name of the road on which the work zone applies

RoadDirection.description: The designated direction of the roadway that is impacted by the work zone activity

Latitude.description: The estimated latitude along the roadway where the work zone area begins

Longitude.description: The estimated longitude along the roadway where the workzone area begins

Milepoint.description: The milepost marker along a roadway where the workzone begins

CrossStreet.description: The cross street along the roadway where the work zone area begins

Latitude.description: The estimated latitude along the roadway where the work zone area ends

Longitude.description: The estimated longitude along the roadway where the workzone area ends

Milepoint.description: The milepost marker along a roadway where the workzone ends

CrossStreet.description: The cross street along the roadway where the work zone area ends
